# default

**Type Property**

Uses the default selection behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
static let `default`: PhotosPickerSelectionBehavior
```

## Getting standard selection behaviors

- **ordered**: Uses the selection order the user made, numbering the selected items.

items.description: Uses the selection order the user made, numbering the selected items.
items.name: ordered
